Source Concept DetailsTarget Concept DetailsComment
Codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Linkage|5.0.0Codes from
LinkageLinkagehttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Linkage#LinkageFHIR R5 Resource `Linkage` is representable via FHIR R4B Resource `Linkage`. Element `Linkage` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage`.
http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-LinkageFHIR R5 Resource `Linkage` is representable via FHIR DSTU2 Resource `Basic`. Element `Linkage` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Linkage.metametahttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Linkage#Linkage.metaElement `Linkage.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.meta`.
Basic.metaElement matches Basic element path `Resource.meta`, use that element instead. Element `Linkage.meta` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Linkage.implicitRulesimplicitRuleshttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Linkage#Linkage.implicitRulesElement `Linkage.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.implicitRules`.
Basic.implicitRulesElement matches Basic element path `Resource.implicitRules`, use that element instead. Element `Linkage.implicitRules` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Linkage.languagelanguagehttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Linkage#Linkage.languageElement `Linkage.language` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.language`.
Basic.languageElement matches Basic element path `Resource.language`, use that element instead. Element `Linkage.language` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Linkage.texttexthttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Linkage#Linkage.textElement `Linkage.text` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.text`.
Basic.textElement matches Basic element path `DomainResource.text`, use that element instead. Element `Linkage.text` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Linkage.containedcontainedhttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Linkage#Linkage.containedElement `Linkage.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.contained`.
Basic.containedElement matches Basic element path `DomainResource.contained`, use that element instead. Element `Linkage.contained` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Linkage.activeactivehttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Linkage#Linkage.activeElement `Linkage.active` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.active`.
http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Linkage:activeElement `Linkage.active` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Linkage.authorauthorhttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Linkage#Linkage.authorElement `Linkage.author` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.author`.
Basic.authorElement matches Basic element path `Basic.author`, use that element instead. Element `Linkage.author` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Linkage.itemitemhttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Linkage#Linkage.itemElement `Linkage.item` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.item`.
http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Linkage:itemElement `Linkage.item` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Linkage.item.typetypehttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Linkage#Linkage.item.typeElement `Linkage.item.type` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.item.type`.
http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Linkage:item:typeElement `Linkage.item.type` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Linkage.item` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Linkage.item.type` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Linkage.item.resourceresourcehttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Linkage#Linkage.item.resourceElement `Linkage.item.resource` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.item.resource`.
http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Linkage:item:resourceElement `Linkage.item.resource` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Linkage.item` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Linkage.item.resource` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.

name: ConceptMapR5LinkageElementsForR4Linkage
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 Resource `Linkage` is representable via FHIR R4B Resource `Linkage`.
Element `Linkage` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage`.

FHIR R5 Resource `Linkage` is representable via FHIR DSTU2 Resource `Basic`.
Element `Linkage` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Element `Linkage.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.meta`.

Element matches Basic element path `Resource.meta`, use that element instead.
Element `Linkage.meta` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Element `Linkage.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.implicitRules`.

Element matches Basic element path `Resource.implicitRules`, use that element instead.
Element `Linkage.implicitRules` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Element `Linkage.language` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.language`.

Element matches Basic element path `Resource.language`, use that element instead.
Element `Linkage.language` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Element `Linkage.text` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.text`.

Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.text`, use that element instead.
Element `Linkage.text` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Element `Linkage.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.contained`.

Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.contained`, use that element instead.
Element `Linkage.contained` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Element `Linkage.active` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.active`.
Element `Linkage.active` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Element `Linkage.author` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.author`.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.author`, use that element instead.
Element `Linkage.author` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Element `Linkage.item` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.item`.
Element `Linkage.item` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Element `Linkage.item.type` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.item.type`.

Element `Linkage.item.type` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Linkage.item` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `Linkage.item.type` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
Element `Linkage.item.resource` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Linkage.item.resource`.

Element `Linkage.item.resource` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Linkage.item` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `Linkage.item.resource` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `Linkage` is not mapped.
